title: thepeterson
author: thepeterson
content: Hey guys,I am looking for a small loan to get my last attempt service shares raised a bit (for 9-10 days maximum) until I buy some btcI have a good financial stats for this account joining couple of runs and my main CryptoHFs paying out for services.If you might be interested in funding 0.002 btc for 0.0025 in 9-10 days PM me in a maximum of 24 hours to catch up with the plan cycle.Thanks!
